title: How to Create a Slideshow on iPad

steps.title: Open Photos.
steps.content: Open Photos. It's the app that has an image of a color wheel that resembles a flower.

steps.title: Tap the Albums tab.
steps.content: Tap the Albums tab. It's in the bottom-right corner. It has an image of a folder. Click here to read how to create an album in Photos.

steps.title: Tap Slideshow.
steps.content: Tap Slideshow . It's in the upper-right corner. This will display the images as a slideshow.

steps.title: Tap the center of an image.
steps.content: Tap the center of an image. This will display the pause and options buttons.

steps.title: Tap the pause button.
steps.content: Tap the pause button. It's at the bottom-center of the page. Tap the Play button in the same location to resume the slideshow.

steps.title: Tap Options.
steps.content: Tap Options . It's in the lower-right corner. Tap Theme to change the say the slideshow is presented. Tap Music to change the music of the slideshow, or turn it off. Tap next to "Repeat" to repeat the slideshow. Use the slider bar at the bottom of the options menu to change the speed of the slide show.

steps.title: Tap Done.
steps.content: Tap Done . This will stop the slideshow and return to the album.
